name: Julius Brown and the Golden Skull
name_original: Julius Brown and the Golden Skull
description:
Join Julius on a dangerous journey to recover the greatest relic: The Golden Skull.

This game is a remake of an old project i made 30 years ago for the Atari 800XL computer system. Also, it's a prequel of my game "Julius Brown and The Lost Dungeons".

The development is in an early stage, but i uploaded an alpha demo of the main core of the game.

Please try it and comment! Any feedback will be greatly appreciated.

Controls:

ASWD : Move

Spacebar: Jump

Mouse: Collect and Use Items.
